turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I placed an order last week and it still says 'processing'. What's going on? Order number is #12345.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear you're experiencing a delay with order #12345. Let me check the status for you. One moment...

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, thanks. I'm getting a little frustrated. I needed this package by the end of the week.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. It appears your order is currently being prepared for shipment at our warehouse. We are experiencing a slight backlog due to increased order volume. I've escalated this to our shipping department, and it should ship within 24-48 hours. You'll receive a tracking number once it ships.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, 24-48 hours... Will I get any kind of compensation for this delay? I'm a loyal customer and this isn't the first time something like this has happened.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Let me see... Regarding compensation, I am authorized to offer you free expedited shipping on your next order. Would you like me to add a note to your account for that?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, alright. That's acceptable, I guess. Yes, please add the note. And could you *guarantee* that future orders won't have these kinds of delays? What steps are you taking to prevent this backlog from happening again, especially around peak shopping times?
